sum (mist_sessions{catalyst="true", sessType="incoming", stream!~"$exclude"})
count(mist_cpu{catalyst="true"})

label_replace(sum(mist_sessions{catalyst="true", sessType="viewers", stream!="000reallylongnonexistenstreamnamethatreallyshouldntexist000", stream!~"$exclude", stream!~"catalyst_vod.+"}[1m] ) by (stream) or on() vector(0), "stream_id", "$1", "stream", ".*\\+(.*)")
sum (mist_sessions{catalyst="true", sessType="incoming", stream!~"$exclude"})
sum (mist_sessions{catalyst="true", sessType="viewers", stream!~"$exclude"})

alert.message:
No livestream viewers globally! 

Something might have nuked our whole infra (or an entry point to it).
alert.name: No viewers globally!

targets.expr: sum(mist_sessions{catalyst="true", sessType="viewers", stream!~"$exclude", stream!~"$exclude"}) by (region)
sum (mist_sessions{catalyst="true", sessType="viewers", stream!~"$exclude", stream!~"$exclude"})
sum(mist_outputs{catalyst_node=~".*studio"}) by (output)
sum(mist_sessions{catalyst="true", sessType="viewers", stream!="000reallylongnonexistenstreamnamethatreallyshouldntexist000", stream!~"$exclude"}[1m] ) by (catalyst_node)

sum(count_over_time({namespace="default", app="catalyst"} |~ "FAIL: onFail" |~ "Key duration mismatch; disconnecting" | pattern "<_> '<_>+<playback_id>': Key duration mismatch; disconnecting <ip> to recover"[30m])) by (playback_id)

sum(count_over_time(
  {namespace="default", app="catalyst"} |~ "\\[DEBUG\\] POST http://127.0.0.1:8935"
  [1m]
)) by (region, pod)
sum(count_over_time({app="catalyst", namespace="default"} |~ "Could not retrieve.*https://" | pattern "<_> https://<host>/"[5m]))

sum(count_over_time({app="ingress-nginx", namespace="default", stream="stderr"} != "sent data after final chunk" |~ "[error]" | pattern `<_> upstream: "<protocol>://<ip>:<port>/<code>.<ext>", host: "<upstreamHost>:<upstreamPort>"` | port = "4242" | ext = "json"[1m]))
sum(mist_sessions{catalyst="true", sessType="incoming", stream!="000reallylongnonexistenstreamnamethatreallyshouldntexist000", stream!~"$exclude"}[1m] ) by (catalyst_node)
count(mist_cpu{catalyst="true"})
count(mist_cpu{catalyst="true"}) by (catalyst_node) or on() vector(0)

alert.message: Catalyst node ${host} is unable to be replicated by lots of other servers. Please investigate this server and take it out of production if necessary.
alert.name: "Could not retrieve" replications alert

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({app="catalyst", namespace="default"} |~ "Could not retrieve.*https://" | pattern "<_> https://<host>/"[5m])) by (host)

sum(count_over_time({app="ingress-nginx", namespace="default", stream="stderr"} != "sent data after final chunk" |~ "[error]" | pattern `<_> upstream: "<protocol>://<ip>:<port>/<code>.<ext>", host: "<upstreamHost>:<upstreamPort>"` | port = "4242" | ext = "json"[1m])) by (upstreamHost)

sum(count_over_time({namespace="default", app="ingress-nginx", stream="stdout"} != "51eebae3-9b8e-48bc-89ca-5340c4074a48.json" | pattern `<ip> - - <timestamp> "<method> <url> <protocol>" <status> <bytes> "<originUrl>" "<userAgent>" <wtf1> <wtf2> [<upstream>] [<wtf3>] <upstreamAddr> <wtf4> <wtf5> <upstreamStatus> <requestId>` | originUrl != "-" | line_format "{{ .originUrl }}" | pattern "<originScheme>://<originDomain>/<originPath>" | line_format "{{ .originDomain }}"[1m])) by (status)

panels.description: If this is occurring a lot, the pod that nodes can't find needs to be deleted.

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({app="catalyst"} |~ "could not find serf member" | logfmt[5m])) by (name)

panels.title: Could not find serf member

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({app="catalyst", namespace="default"} |~ "not allowed"[1m])) by (region)
sum(count_over_time({namespace="default", app="catalyst"} |~ "Packet loss detected" | pattern "<_> MistOutTSSRT:<playback_id> "[1m])) by (playback_id)
sum(count_over_time({namespace="default", app="catalyst"} |~ "Packet loss detected" | pattern "<_> MistOutTSSRT:<playback_id> "[1m]))
sum(count_over_time({app="catalyst", namespace="default"} |~ "Global configuration options not ready"[1m])) by (region, pod)
sum(count_over_time({app="catalyst", namespace="default"} |~ "Shutting down on Serf client failure"[1m])) by (region, pod)

panels.title: Shutting down on Serf client failure

targets.rawSql:
select 
timestamp_trunc(a.created_at_ts, hour) as _hour,
avg(success) as upload_success 

from analytics.studio_assets as a join analytics.studio_users as u 
on a.user_id = u.user_id 

where not u.internal 
and not u.suspended 
and not excusable_error
and a.created_at_ms >= ${__from}
and a.created_at_ms <= ${__to}

group by 1
order by 1 desc

targets.expr:
sum(count_over_time(
  {app="catalyst", namespace="default"}
  |~ "MistProcLivepeer"
  |~ "videorec"
  |~ "Adding 1 tracks"
  | pattern "<_> MistProcLivepeer:videorec+<playbackId> <_> MEDIUM: Adding 1 tracks"[1m]
)) by (playbackId)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT timestamp_trunc(`analytics.nginx_session_summaries`.`end_session_ts`, hour, 'UTC') AS `end_session_ts`, 
(CAST(sum(CASE WHEN `analytics.nginx_session_summaries`.`any_error` = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0.0 END) AS float64) / CASE WHEN count(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE count(*) END) AS `Stream_Success_Rate`
FROM `analytics.nginx_session_summaries`
WHERE (
  `analytics.nginx_session_summaries`.`media_deleted_or_suspended` = FALSE
  AND `analytics.nginx_session_summaries`.`user_suspended` = FALSE 
  and unix_millis(end_session_ts) >= ${__from}
  and unix_millis(end_session_ts) <= ${__to}
  )
GROUP BY `end_session_ts`
ORDER BY `end_session_ts` ASC

SELECT 
timestamp_trunc(time, hour) _hour,
APPROX_QUANTILES(`source`.`ttff_ms`, 100)[OFFSET(75)] AS `TTFF_75th_Percentile`

FROM (
  select *
  FROM `analytics.playback`
  LEFT JOIN `analytics.studio_users` `Studio_Users` ON `analytics.playback`.`user_id` = `Studio_Users`.`user_id`

  WHERE (`Studio_Users`.`internal` = FALSE
     AND `analytics.playback`.`play_intent` = TRUE)
  ) `source` 
  
WHERE (
  `source`.`type` = 'asset' 
  AND unix_millis(time) >= ${__from} and unix_millis(time) <= ${__to} 
  )
GROUP BY 1 

ORDER BY 1 desc
